head.title: Welcome to my first RND Website!
head.text: This website is developed using RND Framework. I can easily customize this website by reading official documentation at: https://www.rndvn.com/docs/

header-banner.title: Welcome to my first RND Website!
header-banner.text: RND Framework is new but comes with a lot of hidden features. It is really easy to develop my websites after learning documentation.

featured-list.title: Global Warming is a huge problem
featured-list.text: We are living on a planet which is burning. RND Framework helps you to build websites for free, but as a return, we asked you to do everything to protect our earth.

featured-item1.title: Drinking Water Issue
featured-item1.text: Do not throw garbage into rivers, oceans, lakes, and whatever keeps natural water.

featured-item2.title: Save Glaciers
featured-item2.text: Releasing CO2 gas can skyrocket the air pollution and melt down glaciers in polar regions.

featured-item3.title: Grow More Trees
featured-item3.text: Humans cut a lot of trees every hour. Just grow at least 1 tree per year.
